overview:
John Powell is a Denver, Colorado based technology professional and is the co-founder of iXiphias.

Prior to iXiphias, John co-founded a start-up specializing in high-school athletic recruiting where he built an online solution that provided athletes with self-help tools in the College recruiting space.

Previously John was the VP of Development & Technology for Mortgage Cadence, overseeing the development of both desktop and web-based loan origination systems. John has also worked with Deere & Company (John Deere), Vantage Point Networks, AdPay Inc., St. Francis Healthcare Corporation, and Jeppesen.

John holds a master’s degree in business administration from Regis University and a bachelor’s degree in management information systems.
